snippet: Kweku M. Adoboli, the former UBS trader charged with false accounting related to a $2.3 billion trading loss, was granted bail by a London court on Friday.
abstract: Kweku M. Adoboli, the former UBS trader charged with false accounting related to a $2.3 billion trading loss, was granted bail by a London court on Friday.

headline.main: Former UBS Trader Is Granted Bail
